Dictionary Spanish-English

perseguir (~ a algo/algn., ~ algo/a algn.) verb—

pursue v (pursued, pursued)

Las dos compaas persiguen un objetivo comn. — The two companies pursue a common goal.

chase sb./sth. v (chased, chased)

La nia persigui a su gato alrededor de la casa. — The girl chased her cat around the house.
El gato persigui al ratn. — The cat chased the mouse.

seek sth. v

La polica persigue pistas para resolver la investigacin. — The police are seeking clues to solve the investigation.
less common:
prosecute v
track sb./sth. down v
persecute v
follow v
hunt v
strive v
go after sb./sth. v
aim for sth. v
bear down v
harass sb. v
course sb./sth. v
chase sb./sth. up v
repress sb./sth. v
hunt down v
hound v
haunt sb./sth. v
